items.title: Alienware’s Aurora 16X RTX 5070 gaming laptop with 32GB RAM/2TB SSD is $400 off today
items.summary:
As part of its now live early Black Friday deals, Best Buy is offering one of Alienware’s Aurora 16X RTX 5070 gaming laptops for $1,699.99 shipped. This 32GB RAM and 2TB SSD configuration usually sells for $2,100, but it’s currently down by a solid $400. It dropped a touch lower as part of a short-lived Holiday Sale deal at Dell last month, and today’s deal at Best Buy lands it within $50 of that price. Dell has other configs of this notebook on sale right now, but this one’s fetching its full price there at $2,100. It’s a good option to pick if you’re looking to buy a new gaming laptop with more memory and storage headroom than what the base variants offer, and you can learn more about it in detail below.

As part of its ongoing early Black Friday Sale, and right alongside its new DELTA 3 1000 Air launch, EcoFlow has kicked off the next of its 48-hour flash sales with up to 71% discounts on four offers – two being solar generator bundles, and two being dual add-on accessory packages. A great option for campers is the DELTA 3 Classic with a 220W solar panel and waterproof protective bag at $599 shipped. This bundle would normally run $1,248 at full price, which we’ve seen go as low as $589 without the bag, which is where it’s currently priced at Amazon, however, you’re getting the addition of the waterproof bag here ($99 value) for only $10 more. All-in-all, you’re looking at a 52% markdown that cuts $649 from the tag for the best price we have tracked. Head below to learn more about this solar generator and browse the other early Black Friday flash offers.

more…
